Class RewindButtonController

  • java.lang.Object

    ButtonController

    public class RewindButtonController
extends AbstractButtonController
    The default Brightcove rewind controller.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RewindButtonController

        public RewindButtonController(android.app.Activity activity,
                      BaseVideoView videoView,
                      int id,
                      android.view.View view,
                      android.graphics.Typeface font)
        DefaultMediaController requires a reference to the Activity for resource lookups and toggling full-screen mode. Also requires a BrightcoveVideoView to determine the play/pause state.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Android application context.
        videoView - the BrightcoveVideoView (or BCCVideoView) to attach the controller to...
        id - The rewind button Android resource identifier.
        view - The parent view.
        font - The typeface providing the button glyphs.

      • setRewindDefault

        public void setRewindDefault(int seconds)
        Sets the default rewind time.
        Parameters:
        seconds - The number of seconds to back up.
